description:
The United Nations unveiled its COVID-19 Global Vaccination Response Team, and who do we see at the top of the food chain? French president Emmanuel Macron, who has already declared his desire to lead the New World Order, and Melinda Gates who wants to give everyone a vaccination and digital ID.

We told you this would happen quickly, and so it is. The United Nations is wasting no time in assembling a global response to COVID-19, and the two key players. Antichrist wannabe Emmanuel Macron, recently blessed by both Pope Francis and the UN Security Council, will be the face of this effort, and Melinda Gates, representing her husband Bill Gates and their eponymous population control foundation, providing the seed money to get the ball rolling. 
Itâ€™s rolling, alright, all the way down to the pit of hell.
Just remember, that as we continue to expose them and the New World Order, they will tolerate us less and less. At some point, persecution will come.
